Job Title: Business Consultant / Sales Engineer (remote)

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Consulting, Information Technology, Sales

Description:
CCC Intelligent Solutions is a leading technology company helping to improve the insurance claims process for millions of people. Our award-winning SaaS platform connects more than 35,000 businesses, including insurance carriers, repair facilities, automakers, part suppliers, lenders, and others to streamline the process from start to finish.

Our advanced capabilities in AI, IoT, telematics, data, and analytics drive continual innovation across our platform, as we work to advance the multi-trillion-dollar P&C insurance economy’s digital transformation.

At CCC, our mission is to keep people’s lives moving forward when it matters most. Diversity of experience and perspective is key to our pursuit so we can deliver a future of possibilities for our customers.

The RoleWe are looking for a Business Consultant / Sales Engineer to join our Solutions and Consulting (S&C) Team and drive success in our Insurance Solutions Business. CCC's S&C SEs are part of a matrix go-to-market team and they are engaged in the life-cycle of sales from customer acquisition through implementation hand-off. S&C SEs interact with senior-level business leaders, uncovering business goals and metrics of success. They develop solutions that include CCC offerings, create POC or MVP designs that prove out CCC solutions’ value, and provide success analysis by transforming data to insights. They are integral in supporting sales and account managers by recommending solutions and developing strategies around CCC's products.

Additionally, S&C SEs serves as the eyes and ears to our market and identify opportunities to enhance CCC’s product suite by working with the broader CCC team to bring new and enhanced solutions to market.

Knowledge of Auto and Casualty insurance vertical claims processes and insurance operations is a plus, but not required. We have a structured program for you to learn the ins and outs of the insurance industry.

Key  Responsibilities:

Provide Pre- Sales, Consulting, and Advisory services to CCC’s largest Insurance carrier clients, specifically:

Leverage strategic and operational business consulting skills to help clients create more efficient processes, develop and implement cost-effective solutions, increase overall customer satisfaction, and drive increased usage of CCC solutions.Conduct detailed analysis, case studies, and process reviews to elevate and enhance customers’ businesses.Support CCC’s growth trajectory through contribution to the sales process by leveraging consultative skills to identify opportunities to grow customer usage of CCC solutions.Conduct analysis of large data sets to identify trends and insights that are impactful to clients’ businesses. Provide actionable insights to clients based on the analysis.Development of value proposition material for CCC product suite and serve as a product expert for our clients and account teams.Development of repeatable client engagement material both for internal and external projects (i.e. process reviews, sales approach, software pilots, etc.)Work with CCC’s Product Development organization to identify and request solution enhancements.

Requirements:

Customer-centric approach and passion for client service.3+ years of experience with a top tier consulting, technology or software company.Intellectual curiosity and ability to dig deep, understand the big picture, consider unintended consequences, and identify causes behind symptoms.Strong ability to build trust and relationships with clients as well as internal stakeholders.Ability to quickly understand business processes, diagnose issues, identify efficiency opportunities, and evaluate feasibility of improvement opportunities.Adept at business case requirement gathering, including ability to confidently draw out necessary data by asking questions that lead to meaningful conclusionsExecutive presence, exceptional communication and presentation skills, comfort leading discussions and presenting to clients and senior leadership.Bachelor’s degree required.

About the company’s commitment to its employees:

CCC Intelligent Solutions employees are part of an inclusive culture that brings together diverse backgrounds and perspectives. Our team is defined by our values of: Integrity, Customer-Focus, Innovation, Diversity & Inclusion, and Tenacity. Together, we help our clients and each other achieve new goals.

CCC is committed to providing employees with opportunities to advance their careers and skillsets. CCC team members receive access to training and education reimbursement is available.

CCC offers competitive compensation and generous benefits. Health insurance, PTO, 401K, are just some of the benefits available to team members.

Each team member plays an important role in the company’s success and each team member has a voice. CCC employee engagement and job satisfaction ratings consistently exceed industry norms – underscoring the value CCC places on its employees.

Explore the Employee Experience at CCC.

Experience Level (if available): Associate
